Title: ay
CssList:
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8">

<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">


<link rel="shortcut icon" href="img/logo.jpg" type="image/x-icon">


<style>a, article, aside, body, div, footer, h1, h2, h3, h4, header, li, main, nav, p, section, ul {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0
}

.Article {
    font-weight: bolder
}

i {
    font-style: normal;
    font-family: FontAwesome, serif
}

a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit
}

.Wrapper {
    width: 100%
}

.HeaderWrapper {
    background: #000;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 100
}

.Header {
    align-items: center;
    color: #ccc;
    font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif;
    display: flex;
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-width: 1100px
}

.Logo {
    width: 10%;
    min-width: 60px
}

.Logo img {
    width: 45px
}

.Breadcrumbs {
    font-size: 15px;
    letter-spacing: .7px;
    width: 60%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Breadcrumbs {
        display: none
    }
}

.Breadcrumbs__Link {
    transition: .15s ease-in
}

.Breadcrumbs__Link:hover {
    color: #eee
}

.Menu {
    color: #bfbfbf;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    width: 30%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Menu {
        width: 90%
    }
}

.Menu__Icon {
    font-size: 20px;
    padding: 5px
}

.Menu__Icon:hover {
    color: #fff
}

.MainWrapper {
    width: 100%
}

.Main {
    font-family: Open Sans, Helvetica, Serif;
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-width: 1100px
}

.Main__Category a {
    color: #cb0000
}

.Main__Title h1 {
    color: #595959;
    font-size: 42px;
    line-height: 108%;
    font-weight: 700;
    padding-bottom: 1.08rem
}

.h_contentSeparator {
    display: flex
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .h_contentSeparator {
        flex-wrap: wrap
    }
}

.Article {
    padding: 0 10px;
    width: 70%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Article {
        padding: 0 10px;
        width: 100%
    }
}

.Article img {
    max-width: 100%
}

.Article__By {
    font-size: 14px
}

.Article__By a {
    color: #cb0000;
    font-weight: 700
}

.Article__Time {
    font-size: 14px
}

.Update {
    background: #effff7;
    border: 1px dotted #000;
    vertical-align: top;
    margin: 15px 0
}

.Update img {
    height: 16px;
    padding: 0 5px
}

.Sidebar {
    padding: 0 10px;
    width: 30%;
    margin-top: 27px
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Sidebar {
        width: 100%;
        display: none
    }
}

.Sidebar img {
    max-width: 100%
}

.Sidebar__Widget {
    width: 100%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Sidebar__Widget {
        width: 90%;
        margin: 0 auto
    }
}

.Widget__Title {
    align-items: center;
    background: #000;
    color: #fff;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 10px 0;
    padding: 10px
}

.Widget__Title h3 {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400
}

.SideVideos {
    width: 100%
}

.SideVideos__Elem {
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    display: flex
}

.SideVideos__Image {
    width: 30%
}

.SideVideos__Image img {
    width: 100%
}

.WidgetLines {
    width: auto;
    width: 40%
}

.WidgetLine {
    height: 3px;
    margin: 3px 0;
    background: #cb0000;
    width: 100%
}

.SideVideos__Text {
    padding-left: 5px;
    width: 70%
}

.SideMas__Main {
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px
}

.SideMas__Image, .SideMas__Image img {
    width: 100%
}

.Footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    margin: 20px auto;
    max-width: 1050px;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%
}

.FooterWrapper {
    background: #000;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px 0
}

.Footer {
    font-family: Open Sans, Helvetica, serif;
    color: #fff;
    max-width: 1100px;
    margin: 10px auto 0
}

.Footer__Redbar {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center
}

.Footer__Redbar .WidgetLines {
    width: 70% !important
}

.Footer__Last {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Footer__Last {
        flex-wrap: wrap
    }
}

.h_leftLast {
    width: 50%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .h_leftLast {
        width: 100%
    }
}

a:not(.paddingless) > img {
}

.Article p {
    line-height: 153%
}

.Article p, h2 {
    padding-bottom: 18px
}

@keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

@-webkit-keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .HeaderWrapper {
        position: relative
    }
}

#comments {
    display: block
}

h2 {
    margin-top: 18px
}

.Article > p a {
    color: red
}

.Article a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

@media (max-width: 700px) {
    a img {
        width: 100%
    }
}

.text-uppercase {
    text-transform: uppercase
}

body {
    overflow-X: hidden
}

.SideVideos__Image {
    max-width: 90px;
    margin-right: 9px
}

.SideMas__Image {
    max-width: 300px
}

@media (min-width: 769px) {
    body {
        padding-top: 81px
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .Main__Category, .Main__Title h1 {
        padding-left: 2.5%;
        padding-right: 2.5%
    }

    .Main__Title h1 {
        font-size: 20px
    }

    .MainWrapper {
        padding-top: 18px
    }
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors {
    display: block;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: center;
    border-bottom: 2px dashed grey;
    margin-bottom: 1.53rem;
    font-size: .81rem;
    position: relative
}

@media (max-width: 531px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors {
        padding-bottom: 1.8rem
    }
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors span {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: .27rem;
    background: #fff;
    transform: translateY(9px)
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
    width: 30px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: -7px
}

@media (max-width: 531px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
        top: 1.71rem
    }
}

@media (max-width: 406px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
        top: 2.7rem
    }
}

.blue-title {
    color: #0198bd;
    text-align: center
}

.blue-title, .red-title {
    display: block;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.35rem
}

.red-title {
    color: red
}

p.update {
    margin-top: 1.08rem;
    border: 1px dotted #000;
    background: #effff7;
    padding: 4px 9px
}

.product-box {
    margin: 1.08rem 0;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-flow: row;
    justify-content: space-between
}

@media (max-width: 522px) {
    .product-box {
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .product-box a.offer-button, .product-box h4 {
        margin-bottom: 1.08rem
    }
}

.product-box .featured-product {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: .81rem
}

.product-box .featured-product a {
    display: block;
    flex: auto;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center
}

.product-box .featured-product a > img {
    transition: .54s ease-in-out;
    max-width: 250px
}

@media (min-width: 450px) {
    .product-box .featured-product a:hover {
        transition: .54s ease-in-out
    }

    .product-box .featured-product a:hover > img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
        transition: .54s ease-in-out
    }
}

.product-box .offer-text {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: column;
    flex: auto;
    justify-content: space-around;
    padding: 1.08rem
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    display: block;
    padding: 8px 25px;
    color: #fff;
    background: red;
    border-radius: 8px;
    animation-name: pulse;
    -webkit-animation-name: pulse;
    animation-duration: 1.5s;
    -webkit-animation-duration: 1.5s;
    animation-iteration-count: infinite;
    -webkit-animation-iteration-count: infinite;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 1.35rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none
}

.product-box a.offer-button:hover {
    text-decoration: none
}

h4.offer-title {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: row;
    align-items: flex-start
}

h4.offer-title img {
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    transform: translateY(-9px)
}

.Article > p a, .Article h2 a, .week-container p a {
    border-bottom: none !important;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 gold;
    color: red;
    transition: .15s ease-in-out
}

.Article > p a:hover, .Article h2 a:hover, .week-container p a:hover {
    box-shadow: inset 0 -26px 0 gold;
    transition: .15s ease-in-out;
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.Sidebar {
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    max-width: 450px
}

.SideMas__Image {
    max-width: 100%
}

.SideMas__Image a, .SideMas__Image a img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.Sidebar a:hover {
    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .81)
}

p.update {
    display: inline-block
}

p.update img {
    transform: translateY(5px)
}

.first-uppercase {
    display: inline-block
}

a.sidebar-testimonial {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis {
    color: #cb0000
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis.bold {
    font-weight: 700
}

a.sidebar-testimonial p.review {
    font-style: italic
}

a.sidebar-testimonial:hover p.review {
    color: #0f3e5b;
    transition: .45s ease-in-out
}

.quote-author {
    text-align: right;
    font-size: 90%;
    padding-top: .45rem
}

span[data-random-city] {
    font-weight: 700
}

span.before-after {
    color: #fff;
    background: #cb0000;
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: .45rem
}

a.captioned-image {
    font-size: 14px
}

a.captioned-image * {
    box-sizing: border-box
}

a.captioned-image:hover {
    text-decoration: none
}

a.captioned-image img {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

a.captioned-image span.caption {
    background: grey;
    color: #fff;
    display: block;
    padding: 9px;
    margin-top: -5px
}

.time_circles {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%
}

img {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

#comments.fb {
    margin: auto !important;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.36em;
    display: flex
}

#comments.fb .comments-container {
    width: 100%
}

#comments.fb p, #comments.fb span {
    font-family: CNN Sans Display W04 Light, sans-serif;
    margin-bottom: 0
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fba, #comments.fb a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #3b5998;
    cursor: pointer
}

#comments.fb .fba:hover, #comments.fb a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before, #comments.fb .fb-reply:before {
    content: " ";
    color: #7f7f7f;
    display: inline-block
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before {
    content: url(index.html);
    display: inline-block;
    transform: translate(20px, 7px)
}

#comments.fb .fb-name {
    font-weight: 700
}

#comments.fb .fb-article {
    margin: 5px 0;
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #7f7f7f
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-like, #comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-reply {
    color: #627aad
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-counter em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 13px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
    margin-right: 3px
}

#comments.fb .fb-heading {
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 0 0 24px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit {
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin: 0 0 24px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input {
    border: 1px solid #d3d6db;
    padding: 15px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input input {
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none;
    outline: none
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 24px 0 0;
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 2px;
    margin-right: 6px
}

#comments.fb ul {
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none
}

#comments.fb ul li {
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 12px
}

#comments.fb ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul {
    border-left: 1px dotted #d3d6db;
    margin: 12px 0 24px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li {
    padding-left: 60px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10px;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-weight: 400
}

.benefits-table {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    text-decoration: none;
    background: #f9faf2;
    padding: .81rem
}

@media (max-width: 603px) {
    .benefits-table {
        padding: .81rem;
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .benefits-table img {
        max-width: 306px
    }
}

.benefits-table:hover, .benefits-table:hover * {
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.benefits-table > div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex: 0 0 50%
}

.benefits-table img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.benefits-table ul {
    list-style-type: none
}

.benefits-table ul li {
    display: flex;
    padding: .81rem;
    align-items: baseline;
    color: #333
}

.benefits-table ul li:before {
    font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free;
    content: "\F058";
    margin-right: .45rem
}

span.intro-letter {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    font-size: 3.6rem;
    height: 2.7rem;
    vertical-align: top;
    padding-right: .18rem;
    line-height: 3.24rem;
    font-family: Times, serif, Georgia
}

.main-content-wrap {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap
}

.full-width-wrap {
    width: 100%;
    padding-left: 5%;
    padding-right: 5%
}

@media (min-width: 961px) {
    .main-content-wrap .Article {
        order: 1
    }

    .full-width-wrap {
        order: 3
    }

    .Sidebar {
        order: 2
    }
}

.week-container {
    display: flex;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, .18);
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
    border-radius: 5px;
    min-height: 216px
}

@media (max-width: 451px) {
    .week-container {
        flex-flow: column;
        align-items: center
    }
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap {
    display: flex;
    align-items: baseline;
    margin-top: 18px;
    margin-left: .81rem
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap > div {
    width: 100%
}

.week-container > div:first-of-type {
    flex: 0 0 176px
}

.week-container > div:last-of-type {
    padding: .81rem
}

.week-container img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

.mt-1 {
    margin-top: 1.08rem
}

.progress {
    width: 100%;
    height: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 1.08rem;
    background: #ff8a8a;
    overflow: hidden
}

.progress-bar {
    transition: .18s ease-in-out
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    background: #67c908
}</style>
<style>.fa {
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    display: inline-block;
    font-style: normal;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-rendering: auto;
    line-height: 1
}

.fa-angle-down:before {
}

.fa-bars:before {
}

.fa-search:before {
}

.sr-only {
    border: 0;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px
}

.fa {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"
}

.fa {
    font-weight: 900
}</style>
<link href="favicon.ico" rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon">
<meta http-equiv="x-dns-prefetch-control" content="on">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://www.no.com/">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://accounts.google.com/">


<script type="text/javascript">
    function today(delta) {
        var ld = new Date(Date.now() + (86400000 * delta));
        return document.write(ld.toLocaleDateString());
    }
</script>

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Article {
        padding: 0 10px;
        width: 100%
    }
}

.Article img {
    max-width: 100%
}

.Article__By {
    font-size: 14px
}

.Article__By a {
    color: #cb0000;
    font-weight: 700
}

.Article__Time {
    font-size: 14px
}

.Update {
    background: #effff7;
    border: 1px dotted #000;
    vertical-align: top;
    margin: 15px 0
}

.Update img {
    height: 16px;
    padding: 0 5px
}

.Sidebar {
    padding: 0 10px;
    width: 30%;
    margin-top: 27px
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Sidebar {
        width: 100%;
        display: none
    }
}

.Sidebar img {
    max-width: 100%
}

.Sidebar__Widget {
    width: 100%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Sidebar__Widget {
        width: 90%;
        margin: 0 auto
    }
}

.Widget__Title {
    align-items: center;
    background: #000;
    color: #fff;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 10px 0;
    padding: 10px
}

.Widget__Title h3 {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400
}

.SideVideos {
    width: 100%
}

.SideVideos__Elem {
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    display: flex
}

.SideVideos__Image {
    width: 30%
}

.SideVideos__Image img {
    width: 100%
}

.WidgetLines {
    width: auto;
    width: 40%
}

.WidgetLine {
    height: 3px;
    margin: 3px 0;
    background: #cb0000;
    width: 100%
}

.SideVideos__Text {
    padding-left: 5px;
    width: 70%
}

.SideMas__Main {
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px
}

.SideMas__Image, .SideMas__Image img {
    width: 100%
}

.Footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    margin: 20px auto;
    max-width: 1050px;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%
}

.FooterWrapper {
    background: #000;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px 0
}

.Footer {
    font-family: Open Sans, Helvetica, serif;
    color: #fff;
    max-width: 1100px;
    margin: 10px auto 0
}

.Footer__Redbar {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center
}

.Footer__Redbar .WidgetLines {
    width: 70% !important
}

.Footer__Last {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .Footer__Last {
        flex-wrap: wrap
    }
}

.h_leftLast {
    width: 50%
}

@media screen and (min-width: 300px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .h_leftLast {
        width: 100%
    }
}

a:not(.paddingless) > img {
}

.Article p {
    line-height: 153%
}

.Article p, h2 {
    padding-bottom: 18px
}

@keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

@-webkit-keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .HeaderWrapper {
        position: relative
    }
}

#comments {
    display: block
}

h2 {
    margin-top: 18px
}

.Article > p a {
    color: red
}

.Article a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

@media (max-width: 700px) {
    a img {
        width: 100%
    }
}

.text-uppercase {
    text-transform: uppercase
}

body {
    overflow-X: hidden
}

.SideVideos__Image {
    max-width: 90px;
    margin-right: 9px
}

.SideMas__Image {
    max-width: 300px
}

@media (min-width: 769px) {
    body {
        padding-top: 81px
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .Main__Category, .Main__Title h1 {
        padding-left: 2.5%;
        padding-right: 2.5%
    }

    .Main__Title h1 {
        font-size: 20px
    }

    .MainWrapper {
        padding-top: 18px
    }
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors {
    display: block;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: center;
    border-bottom: 2px dashed grey;
    margin-bottom: 1.53rem;
    font-size: .81rem;
    position: relative
}

@media (max-width: 531px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors {
        padding-bottom: 1.8rem
    }
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors span {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: .27rem;
    background: #fff;
    transform: translateY(9px)
}

.discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
    width: 30px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: -7px
}

@media (max-width: 531px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
        top: 1.71rem
    }
}

@media (max-width: 406px) {
    .discount-for-readers span.scissors .scissors-icon {
        top: 2.7rem
    }
}

.blue-title {
    color: #0198bd;
    text-align: center
}

.blue-title, .red-title {
    display: block;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.35rem
}

.red-title {
    color: red
}

p.update {
    margin-top: 1.08rem;
    border: 1px dotted #000;
    background: #effff7;
    padding: 4px 9px
}

.product-box {
    margin: 1.08rem 0;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-flow: row;
    justify-content: space-between
}

@media (max-width: 522px) {
    .product-box {
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .product-box a.offer-button, .product-box h4 {
        margin-bottom: 1.08rem
    }
}

.product-box .featured-product {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: .81rem
}

.product-box .featured-product a {
    display: block;
    flex: auto;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center
}

.product-box .featured-product a > img {
    transition: .54s ease-in-out;
    max-width: 250px
}

@media (min-width: 450px) {
    .product-box .featured-product a:hover {
        transition: .54s ease-in-out
    }

    .product-box .featured-product a:hover > img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
        transition: .54s ease-in-out
    }
}

.product-box .offer-text {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: column;
    flex: auto;
    justify-content: space-around;
    padding: 1.08rem
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    display: block;
    padding: 8px 25px;
    color: #fff;
    background: red;
    border-radius: 8px;
    animation-name: pulse;
    -webkit-animation-name: pulse;
    animation-duration: 1.5s;
    -webkit-animation-duration: 1.5s;
    animation-iteration-count: infinite;
    -webkit-animation-iteration-count: infinite;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 1.35rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none
}

.product-box a.offer-button:hover {
    text-decoration: none
}

h4.offer-title {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: row;
    align-items: flex-start
}

h4.offer-title img {
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    transform: translateY(-9px)
}

.Article > p a, .Article h2 a, .week-container p a {
    border-bottom: none !important;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 gold;
    color: red;
    transition: .15s ease-in-out
}

.Article > p a:hover, .Article h2 a:hover, .week-container p a:hover {
    box-shadow: inset 0 -26px 0 gold;
    transition: .15s ease-in-out;
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.Sidebar {
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    max-width: 450px
}

.SideMas__Image {
    max-width: 100%
}

.SideMas__Image a, .SideMas__Image a img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.Sidebar a:hover {
    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .81)
}

p.update {
    display: inline-block
}

p.update img {
    transform: translateY(5px)
}

.first-uppercase {
    display: inline-block
}

a.sidebar-testimonial {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis {
    color: #cb0000
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis.bold {
    font-weight: 700
}

a.sidebar-testimonial p.review {
    font-style: italic
}

a.sidebar-testimonial:hover p.review {
    color: #0f3e5b;
    transition: .45s ease-in-out
}

.quote-author {
    text-align: right;
    font-size: 90%;
    padding-top: .45rem
}

span[data-random-city] {
    font-weight: 700
}

span.before-after {
    color: #fff;
    background: #cb0000;
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: .45rem
}

a.captioned-image {
    font-size: 14px
}

a.captioned-image * {
    box-sizing: border-box
}

a.captioned-image:hover {
    text-decoration: none
}

a.captioned-image img {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

a.captioned-image span.caption {
    background: grey;
    color: #fff;
    display: block;
    padding: 9px;
    margin-top: -5px
}

.time_circles {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%
}

img {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

#comments.fb {
    margin: auto !important;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.36em;
    display: flex
}

#comments.fb .comments-container {
    width: 100%
}

#comments.fb p, #comments.fb span {
    font-family: CNN Sans Display W04 Light, sans-serif;
    margin-bottom: 0
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fba, #comments.fb a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #3b5998;
    cursor: pointer
}

#comments.fb .fba:hover, #comments.fb a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before, #comments.fb .fb-reply:before {
    content: " ";
    color: #7f7f7f;
    display: inline-block
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before {
    content: url(index.html);
    display: inline-block;
    transform: translate(20px, 7px)
}

#comments.fb .fb-name {
    font-weight: 700
}

#comments.fb .fb-article {
    margin: 5px 0;
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #7f7f7f
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-like, #comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-reply {
    color: #627aad
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-counter em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 13px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
    margin-right: 3px
}

#comments.fb .fb-heading {
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 0 0 24px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit {
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin: 0 0 24px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input {
    border: 1px solid #d3d6db;
    padding: 15px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input input {
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none;
    outline: none
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 24px 0 0;
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 2px;
    margin-right: 6px
}

#comments.fb ul {
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none
}

#comments.fb ul li {
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 12px
}

#comments.fb ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul {
    border-left: 1px dotted #d3d6db;
    margin: 12px 0 24px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li {
    padding-left: 60px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10px;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-weight: 400
}

.benefits-table {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    text-decoration: none;
    background: #f9faf2;
    padding: .81rem
}

@media (max-width: 603px) {
    .benefits-table {
        padding: .81rem;
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .benefits-table img {
        max-width: 306px
    }
}

.benefits-table:hover, .benefits-table:hover * {
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.benefits-table > div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex: 0 0 50%
}

.benefits-table img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.benefits-table ul {
    list-style-type: none
}

.benefits-table ul li {
    display: flex;
    padding: .81rem;
    align-items: baseline;
    color: #333
}

.benefits-table ul li:before {
    font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free;
    content: "\F058";
    margin-right: .45rem
}

span.intro-letter {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    font-size: 3.6rem;
    height: 2.7rem;
    vertical-align: top;
    padding-right: .18rem;
    line-height: 3.24rem;
    font-family: Times, serif, Georgia
}

.main-content-wrap {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap
}

.full-width-wrap {
    width: 100%;
    padding-left: 5%;
    padding-right: 5%
}

@media (min-width: 961px) {
    .main-content-wrap .Article {
        order: 1
    }

    .full-width-wrap {
        order: 3
    }

    .Sidebar {
        order: 2
    }
}

.week-container {
    display: flex;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, .18);
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
    border-radius: 5px;
    min-height: 216px
}

@media (max-width: 451px) {
    .week-container {
        flex-flow: column;
        align-items: center
    }
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap {
    display: flex;
    align-items: baseline;
    margin-top: 18px;
    margin-left: .81rem
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap > div {
    width: 100%
}

.week-container > div:first-of-type {
    flex: 0 0 176px
}

.week-container > div:last-of-type {
    padding: .81rem
}

.week-container img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

.mt-1 {
    margin-top: 1.08rem
}

.progress {
    width: 100%;
    height: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 1.08rem;
    background: #ff8a8a;
    overflow: hidden
}

.progress-bar {
    transition: .18s ease-in-out
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    background: #67c908
}</style>
<style>.fa {
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    display: inline-block;
    font-style: normal;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-rendering: auto;
    line-height: 1
}

.fa-angle-down:before {
}

.fa-bars:before {
}

.fa-search:before {
}

.sr-only {
    border: 0;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px
}

.fa {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"
}

.fa {
    font-weight: 900
}</style>
<meta http-equiv="x-dns-prefetch-control" content="on">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://www.no.com/">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://accounts.google.com/">


<script type="text/javascript">
    function today(delta) {
        var ld = new Date(Date.now() + (86400000 * delta));
        return document.write(ld.toLocaleDateString());
    }
</script>
